1462926469424893952.name: RegisB #NHSHeroes
1462926469424893952.content:
Bitcoin isn't designed for quick transactions. It's the equivalent of getting a gold bullion out your backpack, boiling it down, waiting for it to cool, minting the coins and then paying.

There are better crypto programs than bitcoin designed for rapid transactions.
